titleStmt.title: The figure of Antichrist with the tokens of the end of the world, most plainly disciphered by a Catholike and diuine exposition of the seconde epistle of Paul to the Thessalonians, collected out of the best and most approued diuines, both olde and new, very profitable for all men in this age to reade: published by Thomas Tymme, minister.
titleStmt.author: Tymme, Thomas, d. 1620.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
